channel.title: Posts on Ravings of a Mad Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Ravings of a Mad Engineer

item.title: William Optics Fluorostar 91mm
item.description: I recently acquired the William Optics Fluorostar 91 as both a visual and imaging telescope. I selected this model because of the excellent optical quality, large number of included accessories and the avaliability of multiple options of field flatteners from William Optics. I also wanted a little bit more aperture than your standard 80mm while still staying around 500mm of focal length.

item.title: Setting up the Sky-Watcher EQ6-R
item.description: The Sky-Watcher EQ6-R Pro is a German Equatorial telescope mount with many improvements over other mounts that make it ideal for astrophotography.
